Text: Stanislav Kostka Neumann:  He has undergone many stages of creative: symbolist ("I Am an Apostle of the New Life"), anarchist ("A Dream About a Crowd of Desperate People, and Other Verses"), landscape lyric ("The Book of Forests, Hills, and Waters"), civilist ("New Songs"), communist ("Red Songs") and others.

Triplets:<Stanislav Kostka Neumann
2:
--------------------
Text: Stanislav Kostka Neumann:  He was one of the founders of the Communist Party of Czechoslovakia.
